title: Excited about how Node.js works!!!!
description: Basic work flow of Node.js. 1) Create server using node and express. Define router.Define Middleware (logging, parsing JSON, handling errors). 2) Router to handle endpoints and HTTP methods. And define controllers to process requests, interact with databases and return response. 3) Database Integration using mongoose, a library for MongoDB and pg (node-postgres) for PostgreSQL. 4) Error Handling: Handle invalid inputs, server error, required etc. And return appropriate HTTP responses. Schema and methods for databases are also included. Authorization, security, using Bcrypt, JWT etc, managing middlewares are optinal but play crucial role.

title: Unlocking the Power of Apache Hadoop
description: Apache Hadoop is an open-source software framework used for distributed storage and processing of large datasets across clusters of computers. It is designed to handle the challenges of big data, which refers to data sets that are too large or complex to be processed using traditional methods.
